attributes.action: reveal details about military interest in the balls of light & crop circle phenomenon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want an explanation about why us & uk,army helicopters are so interested in the golden balls of light that fly around the crop circles of wiltshire.Surely it is our right to know if we are in any danger from whatever it is the army are watching!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
